1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.18:
New Features:
- Created soil registry system.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.17:
New Features:
- API support for new Dynamic Trees PHC Add-on feature.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.16:
New Features:
- Add alternative snow layer block that forms on leaves(disabled by default) for the purpose of shader waving or custom models.
- Add config option for giant mushrooms spawning in roofed forests (enabled by default).
- Internal API additions for add-ons.

Bugs Fixed:
- Transformations potions are not consumed if the target species already matches the potion species.
- Add checks to prevent runaway mimic recursion causing a client side crash under rare circumstances.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.15:
New Features:
- Added patchouli manual.
- Added forge mod update checking.

Bugs Fixed:
- Fixed concurrent modification exception crash during block breaking.
- Fixed concurrent modification exception crash during multiple explosions.
- Fixed "perma-shrub" bug that occured if doDayLightCycle was false.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.14:
New Features:
- Removed "Dynamic" prefix from localized branch names.
- Species name localizations (please be patient while add-ons catch up, species names will be unlocalized until new add-on releases are made with updated lang files).

Bugs Fixed:
- Dimensions other than 0 now grow trees properly again (bug introduced by Serene Seasons integration effort).
- Made rooty dirt blocks get color from mimic instead of grass (thanks Max Hyper).
- Fix optifine shader interaction bug where sky could be seen through breaking texture on trees.
- Fixed small crash with cactus model (thanks Max Hyper).

Internal:
- Enhanced SeasonHelper capabilities with helper functions.
- Removed "Wrapped" classes and redefined blockstate files to be more standard.
- Don't throw an exception when a JoCode file isn't defined.
